source:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_00The Vath keeneye looks at you, a puzzled glimmer in his hard beady eyes.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
ヴァスの塚のサーチャーは、不可解そうに考え込んでいる。

source:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_01Despite finding the concept of drinking alcohol to be extremely unappealing, the Vath keeneye turns out to be a dab hand at making wines, and his home-brew causes quite a stir over at the Convictory. Overwhelmed by the amount he has been asked to produce, he turns to you for assistance. Make your way to the Chocobo Forest and gather three ripe caelumtree fruits.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

サーチャーから、聖フィネア連隊に納品する酒の素材の収集を頼まれた。チョコボの森で「」を3つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_02<tab>You have found three ripe caelumtree fruits. Return to Loth ast Vath and deliver them to the Vath keeneye.
target: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2701 /var>を3つ入手した。ヴァスの塚の「サーチャー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the ripe caelumtree fruits to the Vath keeneye who sets to work, just as a knight from the Convictory appears at the Vath sanctuary. The Convictor is in a desperate hurry to get his wine, but unfortunately for him, it is far from ready. The clever Vath somehow foresaw this would happen, and produces a bottle from his reserve. He asks that you hand it to the restless knight, in hopes that it will tide him over until the new batch of wine is ready.
target: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_03<tab>サーチャーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2701 /var>を渡した。彼は、何やら怪しげな方法で、すぐに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2801 /var>を醸造した。しかし、待ちきれずに聖フィネア連隊の騎兵が取りにきているという。サーチャーは、寝かせた<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2801 /var>を渡すよう冒険者に頼んできた。ヴァスの塚の「聖フィネア連隊の騎兵」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2801 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_04<tab>You hand the bottle of caelumtree wine to the impatient Convictor knight, and his anxious twitching seems to subside. He is eager to know what gives the wine its full flavor, but before you can disclose any details, he comes to the conclusion that only the best of ingredients could make such a fine drink. He leaves the Vath sanctuary with a spring in his step and blissfully unaware of the rather dubious additives which have been sprinkled into his wine.
target: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEQ_04<tab>聖フィネア連隊の騎兵に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2801 /var>を渡した。彼は、素材も醸造法も知らずに、喜んで受け取って帰っていった。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fruit to the Vath keeneye.
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the caelumtree wine to the Convictor knight.
target: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_TODO_02<tab>聖フィネア連隊の騎兵に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C2801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_000<tab>How strange, you fleshlings. We talk with you, we trade with you, yet we do not understand. Why do you love this thing called “wine” so much? It dulls the senses. We do not like this.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_000シシシシシ……つくづく、ヒトとは不可解なものだ。
なんでも、「酒」という発酵させた果汁を飲んで、
わざと能力を鈍らせることを楽しむそうじゃないか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_001<tab>Why, you ask? The Convictory once requested we procure a crate of wine. We knew not where to find it, so we made our own, improvising as necessary with...<click> <click>...special ingredients.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_001いったい、どういうつもりなのかわからんが、
聖フィネア連隊から、その「酒」の製造を頼まれた。
我々なりに作ってみたところ、これがなぜか大好評でな。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_002<tab>They are insatiable. The orders come, and though we work hard, we cannot meet demand. We run low on supplies. Great hunter, please help us.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_002追加の注文が止まらんので、ヒトの冒険者にも、
「酒」の製造を手伝ってもらいたい。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_003<tab>Your generosity knows no bounds! The key ingredient for our wine is the caelumtree fruit─a juicy fruit found in the Chocobo Forest. Please bring back three. The best fruits lie on the forest floors. They are the most ripe.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_003まずは、素材集めからだ。
チョコボの森の北東に落ちている、
「」を、3つほど拾ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_030<tab>Ah, a fellow traveler, is it? Tell me, have you, too, come for the Vath's exquisite caelumtree wine? If not, it's something you absolutely must try!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_030いや～、待ちかねて、ここまで来ちゃったよ～。
早く、「」を渡してくれ～。

TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_010シシシシシ……帰ったか。
「」を、渡してくれるか？

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_011<tab>The fragrant scent─it tells us these caelumtree fruits are at their peak flavor. They will make for a fine batch, indeed! This will take but a moment to prepare. Er... <click> <click> Please excuse us.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_011よし、これはいい具合に熟しているぞ。
少し待ってくれ、あっという間にできるからな。
果実の発酵を促すには、この方法が一番なんだ……

TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_012クチャクチャ……ングング……
ジュクジュク……モグモグ……ペッペッペッ……。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_013<tab>All done! Now, we must let it ferment. This will take time. Our restless friend over there, however, cannot wait so long. He says he is here to collect the wine we were to deliver to the Convictory. It is a good thing we anticipated his arrival! Please take this bottle to him.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_SEARCHER_000_013シシシシシ……あとは、しばし寝かせて発酵させれば完成だ。
だが、気の短いヒトの騎兵が、ここまで取りにきている。
この寝かせておいた「」を渡してくれ。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_020<tab>I couldn't go a moment longer without it, so I've traveled all this way, my good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>. Is it ready? Please, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var> tell me it's ready!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_020いや～、待ちかねて、ここまで来ちゃったよ～。
早く、「」を渡してくれ～。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_021<tab>Ah, there it is─the wine of all wines. There isn't another drink like it! The flavors─the sweetness, the acidity, and the hint of some sort of exotic spice, perhaps─they play across the length of your tongue and trail into the pit of your stomach, leaving you warm and content.
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_021どうも、ありがとう！
独特な香りと酸味があって、美味いんだな～これが。
気持ちよく酔える上に、身体もポカポカ温まるんだよ～。

source: TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_022<tab>I wonder what exactly it could be that lends the wine such a unique flavor. Whenever I ask, the Vath always seem hesitant to tell me. <sigh> I suppose it's a silly question, anyway. It's glaringly obvious something this good can only be crafted with the finest of ingredients!
target:
TEXT_BANGNA403_02268_KIHEI02268_100_022いったい、何の果実から、どうやって作ってるんだろうね？
まあ、美味けりゃどうでもいいんだけど。
よ～し、今夜は飲むぞ～！
